description:
Angelica Burley is a witch and a technician of the Magus Craft.
She has known http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Elias] since she was a child, though not as his apprentice. During magic training, there was an accident causing gems to merge with her flesh. She has grown cautious of magic, though that has not stopped her from opening a magic shop in England. Angelica is married, to an unnamed man, and their daughter is Alucia.
She has formed a familiar bond with a Vodanoi-type of water fairy, http://anidb.net/ch84228 [Hugo]. She also has other neighbors in her shop, suggesting she has the assistance of more than just Hugo.
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki, edited.
name: Angelica Varley
